summary: Created comprehensive test suite for spec 04-wallet-context.md covering WalletContext, all wallet hooks, and wallet components. Tests cover connection lifecycle, error handling, balance management, invoice creation, payment processing, budget tracking, and fiat conversion.
coverage_areas: useBalance hook - balance conversion and polling
useInvoice hook - invoice creation and error handling
usePayment hook - payment processing and balance refresh
useBudget hook - budget tracking and renewal info
WalletCard component - status display and child rendering
WalletConnect component - URL validation and connection
